tool_description: Convert English to Former President Donald Trump speak in a mocking capitalization.
name: Trump Speak
title: Trump Speak

api_list.name: Mock Trump Message
api_list.description: Will convert a message to Trump speak in a mocking format.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://trump-speak.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/convertToTrump"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trump-speak.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://trump-speak.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/convertToTrump"

headers = {

print(response.json())
